TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SmartLabelStyle extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides methods and properties used to perform intelligent, rule-based data point label positioning to resolve overlapping data point label issues.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether a algorithm is enabled.
Docs.value: if an algorithm will be applied to prevent data point labels from overlapping. if overlapping of data point labels will not be prevented. The default value is .

Docs.value: if data point labels are permitted to overlap point markers. if data point labels will be prevented from overlapping the point markers. The default value is .

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether overlapped labels that cannot be repositioned will be hidden.
Docs.value: if labels will be hidden if they overlap. if overlapped labels will not be hidden. The default value is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the point cannot be drawn within the area specified by the properties <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MinMovingDistance%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MaxMovingDistance%2A>, in the directions allowed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.MovingDirection%2A>, property, and this property is `true`, the data point label will not be drawn.
> [!NOTE] > Smart labels only work when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelStyle.Angle%2A> property is set to zero.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the maximum distance, in pixels, that the overlapped object can be moved from the marker.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property specifies the maximum distance in pixels from the data point that data point labels are allowed to be moved in case of overlapping.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the direction(s) in which the overlapped object is allowed to be moved.
Docs.value: A enumeration value or multiple bitwise OR'd values. The default is the bitwise OR of all values to allow repositioning in all directions except to the center of the data point.
